transcript.text:
￼





Frequently Asked Questions
Cookies & GDPR

3 min
what is a cookie banner? what is a cookie banner? a cookie banner is a cookie warning that pop up on a website when a customer visits the site for the first time it declares that cookies and trackers are present on a website and gives the user a choice of consent before their data is processed do i need a cookie banner for my print website? why? do i need a cookie banner for my print website? why? yes, you need a cookie banner for your website to find and control all cookies and trackers on your website, as required by the european gdpr and california’s ccpa with a cookie banner i e a technology that can scan and find all cookies and then present to your website visitors (customers) you can save your end users privacy infringement and data abuse how do i make sure my customers get the notifications to accept cookies? how do i make sure my customers get the notifications to accept cookies? we have provided a site setting that will display a cookie banner to all your website visitors to enable it, go to site settings >> store configuration (tab) and enable the enable cookie warning popup message? setting once a user clicks on it, how many days does the cookie message stay off? once a user clicks on it, how many days does the cookie message stay off? once the user accepts the cookie message it will stay off for forever where can i get more information about gdpr and compliances? where can i get more information about gdpr and compliances? to get more information about gdpr and how onprintshop manages cookies, gdpr, and compliances, go through the file attached if you have any further questions, you can contact support\@onprintshop com https //archbee doc uploads s3 amazonaws com/hfxpyr6 ao5gwa1hn pyx/ tb76xexuykdjhi51qgxl gdpr compliance in onprintshop solution pdf

Updated 11 Jun 2025
